lead_paragraph: Donald Trump says he is unlikely to be the next owner of the Buffalo Bills because he's "not going to do something totally stupid" to make the team his.

headline.main: Trump Says His Buffalo Bills Bid Unlikely to Win
headline.print_headline: Trump Says His Buffalo Bills Bid Unlikely to Win
